alert.note: Alert for Camden; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Camden, southeastern Pasquotank and northeastern Currituck Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Indiantown to 6 miles southeast of Weeksville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indiantown, Old Trap, and Shiloh around 1250 PM EDT. Grandy around 115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Poplar Branch, Aydlett, Listers Corner, Glen Cove, Jarvisburg, Barco, Coinjock, Frog Island, Riddle, and Texas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Western Currituck
